We Have a range of products
Mortgageport Match System
Use our handy home loan calculators to work out what you can borrow, what your home loan repayments would be, or how much you could be saving
Whether you’re buying your first home, upgrading your family home, investing, refinancing or just doing initial research, do the sums with our mortgage and investment calculators. Use our calculators to learn how much you can borrow and what your loan repayments will be different loan scenarios. You can also work out stamp duty and other costs.

Loan calculator process
01. analysis of your needs
Enter your household income and regular expenses
02. strategy for lending
Specify a loan interest rate and over what period of time ( loan term ) you’ll pay off the loan
03. exploring your options
Adjust any of these measures and see straight away what your borrowing capacity will be for varied scenarios
04. structuring your solutions
For example, see the difference in your borrowing capacity if you pay your loan over 25 years or over 30 years
05. approval and settlement process
For example, see the difference in your borrowing capacity if you pay your loan over 25 years or over 30 years
06. reassurance
For example, see the difference in your borrowing capacity if you pay your loan over 25 years or over 30 years
